abstract: The jewelry house’s first female designer, 25-year-old Lucrezia, created five one-of-a-kind designs based on Impressionist and Post-Impressionist works from her husband’s private collection.

headline.main: Buccellati Celebrates Its New York Flagship With Art-Inspired Jewels

snippet: The jewelry house’s first female designer, 25-year-old Lucrezia, created five one-of-a-kind designs based on Impressionist and Post-Impressionist works from her husband’s private collection.
